Our Services

Comprehensive telemedicine services designed to meet the healthcare needs of rural communities

Video Consultations
Face-to-face consultations with qualified doctors from the comfort of your home
  • HD Video Quality
  • Screen Sharing
  • Recording Available
  • Multi-language Support
Chat Support
Real-time messaging with healthcare professionals for quick queries
  • Instant Messaging
  • File Sharing
  • Voice Messages
  • 24/7 Availability
Medical Records
Secure upload and management of your medical reports and documents
  • Secure Storage
  • Easy Access
  • Report Analysis
  • History Tracking
IoT Health Monitoring
Real-time monitoring of vital signs through connected devices
  • Blood Pressure
  • Blood Sugar
  • ECG Monitoring
  • Oxygen Levels
Digital Prescriptions
Receive and manage digital prescriptions from your doctors
  • E-Prescriptions
  • Medication Reminders
  • Pharmacy Integration
  • Refill Alerts
ASHA Worker Support
Tools and resources for community health workers
  • Field Data Collection
  • Patient Tracking
  • Health Surveys
  • Training Resources

Additional Features

Secure & Private

End-to-end encryption ensures your medical data remains private and secure

24/7 Support

Round-the-clock technical and medical support for all users

Multi-User Platform

Separate dashboards for patients, doctors, ASHA workers, and administrators
